extendedInfo.description: F1 2013 News And Info Pro!! - http://goo.gl/uWM33Upgrade to Pro and it removes all adverts inside the application and you get live blogging for practice, qualifying and race. -----------------This application is available for most Android Mobile Devices including Android Tablets (Coming Back Soon!).We are back with are 2nd year in Formula 1 Mobile Application's, and this year we bring a bunch of great improvements. From a brand new Design with a brand new tablet Ui (+7' Coming Back Soon) , improved News Feed, Live Blogging from all race events (Pro), and loads more.  This Un-Official F1 application has latest news from sites like F1 Blog, F1 Fan Cast And More. If your away from the TV you can also keep up with the race with the Live Blog Feature. You can find out when all the pre-season testing and race weekends start and then save each event you would like to your phone Calendar with the Events page. With the Results and Standings page you can keep up to date with the championship standings. Photo Forum, the photo forum allows you to upload your own f1 photos and share them with other F1 Fans. Podcast page allows you to listen to the James Allen on F1 Podcast right in the app and finally the Video section allows you to watch latest F1 Interviews, watch the hit F1 Cartoon Tooned and much more.

reviews.title: good app
reviews.comment: Thank you..
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: a google user
reviews.comment: DON\'T BUY---DON\'T BUY---DON\'T BUY  have to buy an upgrade then all you get is a start screen. Apparently developer is making money.... One star is the minimum for trash

reviews.title: Good. But needs more news feeds.
reviews.comment: Nice app, could do with a few more news feed sited (BBC? Sky? Or would that be because of copyright?). Also as I said before, please remove news stories from autosport as it\'s only possible too read 30 stories a month. Nice they\'ve responded to my comments previously though +\'d 1 star because of it :-)
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Getting better
reviews.comment: Nice to be able to check news on the go. Don\'t understand why the refresh button was removed? JA section has been stuck on 5 days ago news.  Thanks for the reply 5 star service.
reviews.author: Sonofjorel SOJ

reviews.title: Was good...
reviews.comment: App worked great till the last update now won\'t open at all. Just get the start up screen then nothing. Shame really, i liked this app
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Favourite F1 app
reviews.comment: Loved this app last year and the update has made it about 50 times even better! Fantastic.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Love news
reviews.comment: GREAT STUFF.
reviews.author: Robby Suozzi

reviews.comment: Great app
reviews.author: Cormac Kearney

reviews.title: Best F1 news I\'ve used
reviews.comment: Great way to have multiple sites for all F1 news. Way better and more info than other apps I\'ve used from the state\'s.
reviews.author: Greg Forman

reviews.title: Need access to my sms messages?
reviews.comment: And other additional new permissions?  Uninstalling.

reviews.title: Nexus 7
reviews.comment: Works great much better than last year, recommended.

reviews.title: Uninstall
reviews.comment: Sends sms of its own accord.Uninstall.
reviews.author: Craig Baldwin

reviews.title: Dumb
reviews.comment: Not happy with the app. 50 stories per month? There\'s advertising already so what\'s the point of double restrictions? Uninstalled.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Call and sms access???
reviews.comment: Like the app from last year and updating for 2013 season but why does app need to access to calls and sms??? Not sure if  I want to give permission for that?
reviews.author: Robbie Habbick

reviews.title: S3
reviews.comment: Force closes
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Doesn\'t load
reviews.comment: I used to be able to use this app, but the latest update has broken it on my phone. Stays at 40% for hours at a time regardless of cell signal or wifi connection. When it was working, the app repeatedly failed to get posts if it ever got them at all. A google search works better than this app.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Rubbish
reviews.comment: Results won\'t load on my HTC Sensation. Countless other faults. The most user unfriendly app ever. Truly awful.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Great for F1 fans.
